name: Penalties
text: Any person who practices barbering, operates a barber shop, or acts in any capacity wherein a license, apprentice permit, or temporary permit is required, without a license, apprentice permit, or temporary permit as provided in this chapter shall be fined not more than $100, or imprisoned not more than six months, or both.  Each day of violation shall be a separate offense. [L 1947, c 194, §15; RL 1955, §58-13; am L 1961, c 184, §6(b); HRS ; am L 1987, c 246, §10; am L 1993, c 264, §10]
